div.p:
Curia legalis tenta per balliuos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem penultima die
mensis octobris anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die Johannes stevinson secundo die vocatus ad sectam Willelmi moyses / non
comparuit / Ideo precipitur seriendo capere districtum et cetera premunire ipsum ad proximam curiam lega
lem tanquam ad tercium die huius processus

Item eodem die Johannes stephinson secundo die vocatus ad sectam Dauid mathei vt patet in
rotulamento primj diei / non comparuit / quare precipitur seriendo capere districtum viij solidorum ad ipso
Johanne et premunire ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad tercium diem processus

Item eodem die Johannes stephinson' 2o die vocatus ad sectam Walteri pyot pro
ij bollis grossi salis non comparuit Ideo precipitur seriendo videlicet philippo de Dunbrek capere
districtum de ipso Johanne et premunire eundem ad proximam diem legalem tanquam ad tercium
diem huius processus

In curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem vltima die mensis et annj supradictorum
venit ad barram Alexander Irvin manens in tulibowry qui constituit et ordinavit Alexandrum
scrogis suum procuratorem in omnibus causis et querelis ipsum concernentibus infra dictum burgum
et specialiter ad prosequendum et recuperandum certa vasa staugnea et bona a Johanne chep
man seniore eidem constituen' spectan' et in premissis aquend' et defendend' prout Juris
ordo Requirit / Ipso promittens de Rato in latissima forma procuratorii

Eodem die coram preposito et ballivis plena curia Thomas scrogis obligauit se
soluere et satisfacere cuidam thome chepman tres libras vsualis monete
scocie ipsi debitis per dictum thomam scrogis infra quindenam proximo futuro testibus
Dauid menyes iuniore Willelmo blindsel seniore Willelmo futhes Dauid howy
et diuersis aliis

the sammyn dai gilbert leche becom souertie in the courte before the aldir
man and ballies for thomas of marr / that the said Thomas sal mak
compt and payment til alexander trail of his hail fraucht

Item the said day Alexander menyes aldirman is becumin souertie for alexander trail
topay til alexander browne xiiij crowyns and demi within xx dais next
tocum and the said alexander trail is oblist til fre the aldirman of the said souertie
The quhilk some' alexander trail has pait til alexander bron' and his procuratouris the aldirman and thom fife as the said
thomas sais

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene coram preposito et balliuis eiusdem iiijo die
mensis nouembris anno et cetera lxxxmo

Quo die andreas goldsmyth traxit manum suam et bona in plegio et securitate
ad obseruandum Jacobum de Douglas indempnem de j barella salmonum alias optent' per
eundem Andream aduersus dictum Jacobum

The sammyn dai Alexander broune burges of coupar in fife clamyt Alexander
trail of vj li' ij s' of the Rest of ane obligacion / and the said Alexander traile
tuke to prefe him dischargit of the said obligacione / quharapon' the aldir
man and baillies has assignit til alexander trail to preve him dischargit be
the said alexander bron' as said is . within xx daies / And falyeand of the said
prefe within the said terme . the said Alexander trail sal pay the said some' of vj li'
ij s' togiddir with the costis and expensis tobe made be alexander bron' tocum til here
the said prefe et cetera and heirto alexander trail has grantit /

Item the said dai / Robert blindsele as forspekar' for Johne king is content and has
grantit before the aldirman and ballies / that a barrel of tar beand in the handis
of Wil of futhes with the quhilk the said John' intromettit / be deliuerit til Alexander
trail / the said alexander fyndand souertie / that gif the said Johne can preve that he
or his merchandis lade in the hulk callit mary of the quhilk alexander trail
is awnar' and skippar of the half / thre barellis of tar' / that he sal content and assith
him of a barrel of tar' or the avale tharof as the price gais now The quhilk
todo alexander trail has fundin his hand and / gude souertie as said is . And the said
alexander trail is ordanit til deliuer the sammyn barrel of tar' til Johne of marr' for the
barrel of tar optenit be him apon' the maistir and clerc of the said schip

Cristinus myln' posuit se in voluntate balliuorum de amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
Andree chavmer et tenetur emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum
Item dictus andrea accusatus quitus factus fuit per assisam de perturbio dicti cristinj

The sammyn dai It is deliuerit and ordanit be the aldirman and consale that Johne
stewart sal content and pay til Androw murray eldar alsmekil canves as four'
s' g' waring extendis to the quhilk wes optenit before in Jugement

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vj die nouembris anno
Dominj et cetera lxxxmo

Quo die alexander rolland presentavit preposito et ballivis litteras domini nostri Regis sub signeto
eisdem direct' penes certas pecuniarum summas sibi per certos comburgenses dicti burgi
debit' vt in litteris obligatoriis eidem inde confectis plenius continetur / Insuper dicti
prepositus et ballivi premuniverunt Willelmum quelp tunc presentem ad comparendum coram ipsis aut eorum
aliquo in pretorio huius burgi proxima feria sexta inde sequente / ad instanciam dicti alexandri
sibi super quadam obligacione responsurus et Juri periturus

Eodem die gilbertus Waus deuenit plegius sine fideiussor pro Johanne fichet
quod ipse satisfaciet infra quindenam immediate sequentem Agneti neil xviij s'
pro quadam toga sibi per vxorem thome beny tinctoris impignerata

Eodem die elizabeth sanchar' conuicta per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento curie quare iniuste
percussit Jonetam Dys et tenetur emendare eedem ad visum proborum virorum

Item dicta Joneta in amerciamento pro perturbio prefate Elizabeth prout deliberatum fuit per
assisam que reperit ipsam Jonetam causatricem dicti perturbij facti per elizabeth sanchar'

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem viij die nouembris anno
Domini et cetera lxxxmo /

quo die Andreas scot posuit se in voluntate prepositi et ballivi de iniusta extrax
cione cultelli aduersus Johannem narne carnificem / quare adiudicatur in amerciamento et cetera

Item dictus Johannes narne et thomas narne frater eius ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione
Andree scot / sed assisa inuenit quod in modico perturbaverunt eundem / et tenentur emendare dampnum

The sammyn' dai the Aldirman and consale has ordanit and decretit / twicheing the diminicion
that Richard boyl ane of the parisch clerkis has of his quartar of the castel gate mare
than William yong has of his quartar of the gallougate sen it was ordanit that quhilk
of the said quartaris is bettar than vthir sulde be made elike to thaim eftir the avise of the
aldirman and consale as it contenit in the act made tharupon / the said quartaris beand sene
and weil considerit / thai fynd that William yong sal yerly gif in til Richard boyl
twelf schillingis of the excrescence of his quartar be his awne vpgefing / And
this the aldirman and consale ordanis the said Wilyam yong topay yerly til Richard
boile but ony obstakle or demaunde

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xiijo
die mensis nouembris anno Domini supradicto / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die Dauid mathouson prosecutus fuit per plegium Johannem stevynson
de iniusta detencione xxxiij s' vij d' ab eo ad bonum compotum quo quidem Johanne
dictam summam negan' ballivi propter debilitatem curie assignaverunt eidem diem ve
neris proximo futuro ad subeundum determinacionem assise super dicta summa / partibus
ad hoc conscientibus et processibus super dicta causa penes deductis ad tunc in suo robo
re permanen' quodque illa dies veneris stabit dicto Dauid pro tercia die processus si defici
at de comparencia Johannis stephinson' vt premittur

Item eodem die Johannes Waus senior obligauis se satisfacere Dauid Duncanj
seriendo xvj s' in carnispreuio proximo futuro in quibus sibi tenetur pro j barella bitumis

Andreas betty conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione mariote
gudefalou et tenetur emendare dampnum vt exigit ordo Juris

Willelmus lynton' inuenit Johannem de marr' filium plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate andree
stephani aliter quam per viam Juris Et andreas betty deuenit plegius eodemmodo pro andrea stephani

Burgenses et fratres gilde facti tempore prepositure Alexandri meignes
de anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo

Die xxviijua mensis octobris anno Domini supradicto Thomas gledstane Re
ceptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi ad instanciam
et litteratoram requestam domini comitis mariscalli . prestito solito Juramento .

xjmo die Decembris Anno Domini supradicto Willelmus gray carnifex ad instanciam
et requestam venerabilis in christo patris Georgij Abbatis de Abirbroth Receptus fuit in
liberum burgensem huius burgi tantum prestito solito Juramento

Decimo die mensis maij Anno Domini et cetera lxxxjmo Robertus Walcar manens in Willelmo
de glammis constituit et ordinavit ricardum henrici burgensem de Aberdene suum
verum et legittimum procuratorem ad prosequendum robertum valcar' pro summa xlvj s'
et viij d' prestit' sibi in villa de bruges' in flandria et pro suis dampnis et expensis
recedendo et expectando in willa Abirdonensis pro octo daibus promittendo et cetera

xxij die Septembris anno et cetera lxxxj Robertus sleich cordonarius Receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi causa paterne libertatis pro v s' datis preposito in alba bursa
prestito solito Juramento

xxvj die Septembris anno quo supra / Andreas Warrak pistor ad instanciam et requestam
vxoris prepositi Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem huius burgi tantum prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die Willelmus Dauidson Receptus est in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius
burgi ex donacione et concessione prepositi et consilij pro certa summa thome prat de
bit' prout in quondam act' desuper confecto lacius continuetur Juramento solito prestito

xxvij die Septembris predicto Willelmus more manens rure factus fuit liber burgensis
et fratrer gilde huius burgi pro duabus marcis et dimidio prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die Duncanus hatmakar receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum huius burgi pro
vj s' viij d' prestito Juramento solito

Alexander prat carnifex eodem die factus fuit liber burgensis soluendo huius burgi pro vj s'
viij d' / qui prestitit Juramentum consuet'

primo die octobris anno supradicto patricius forbes germanus Willelmi domini forbes Gilber
tus skene de eodem et Johannes menyes Recepti fuerit in liberos burgenses
et confratres gilde huius burgi racione libertatis quondam patrum suorum / quorum quilibet dedit
preposito v s' in alba bursa prestitit solitum Juramentum

Alexander coule factus fuit liber burgensis et frater gilde gracia prepositi consulum et communitatis causa despon
sacionis Relicte thome culan quondam confratris gilde huius burgi prestito solito Juramento

Robertus rede filius domini de badfothellis receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
causa paterne libertatis pro v s' et prestitit iuramentum consuet' et cetera

The xxiiij dai of Julij the yer' of god M iiijc lxxxj Jok blabre in presence of the
aldirman and balyeis in a fensit court has chosin Alexander of marr' tobe til him
curate quhil he be of lauful age togovern' him self and his gudis eftir
the vse consuetude and law of the burgh

the sammyn dai thomas of marr' clamit Wil of gariach of twa pety quartaris
of salt / quhilk action was put til ane asise / and the said assise fand that the
said Wilyam sal pay na mare for his salt na it wes bocht at the first bying
and topay salmond for samekil as he resauit til his part /

Item the said dai Johne the Waus gilbertis son' John' fichet litstar henry lorn' and Sande
talyour ilkane of thaim accusit before the aldirman and balyeis in plain court for the
strublance of androw branche balye in the tym of philp of Dunbrek seriand in
thare officis doing / the quhilk action' was put til ane assise of worthi men
the quhilk assise riply avisit and witnes tharupon sworn and producit fand and
deliuerit / ththe said personis strublaris of the saidis officiaris balye and seriand in
thar' officis doing for the quhilk ilkane of thaim was adiugit in amerciament and toamend
as law wil et cetera

Item the samme dai gilbert Waus is becumin law borgh for John' his son' Johne
fichet and henry lorn' that Androw branch and philp of Dunbrek and thar' partiez salbe
vnscathit bot as law wil
Curia burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxvij die Julij anno quo supra /

quo die
Walterus thomson in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione x libre g' ab Andrea murra
iuniore et ex decreto assise idem Walterus adiudicatur satisfacere dictam summam infra terminum Juris

the sammyn dai / the assise fand and deliuerit / that thar' wes na gudis of quhilum John'
of strabolgyis' in the handis of mage giffard sa fer as thai couth get document
pertening til John' Watson' his ayr / sauffand a comptour' / the quhilk gif scho
can laufully preve / this dai viij dais wes gefin hir be hir son' quhom
god assoilye / scho salbruke it / and falyeande tharof scho sal deliuer it to the ayr'
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio huius burgi per ballivos eiusdem penultima die Julij anno et cetera lxxxj

quo die thomas rolland calumpniavit per plegium Johannem Johannem de culan de iniusta deten
cione ij marcarum / qui peciit diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio et ballivi assignauerunt eidem
diem Juramentum post festum beati michaelis responsurus vt Jura volunt

In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe before the aldirman and
balliez' of the sammyn the viij dai of August the yer' abouewritin Wille
mathoson' second son' of vmquhile John' mathoson' burges of this burgh of his
awne fre wil and motive has chosin Wilyam lord forbes Alexander rede his
gude fadir Thom of marr' and androw culan tobe til him curatis quhil he be
of lauful age of xxj yeris togovern him and his landis rentis and gudis eftir
the law and consuetude of this burgh

The sammyn dai thom cattale in the name and behalue of James abbot Wilyam
of loch alan of crag Wilyam sleich Robyne huledy William Kellow and of James
Wilson' bystandand as forspekar for the fornemit persons opinly protestit that the putting
and referring of the action and question' debatable betuix the saidis merchandis on the
ta parte And henric smyth mastir vndir god of a schip of Danskyn' on the tothir part
to the knawlage and determinacion of ane assise anent the frachting of the schip and
furing of thar gudis / suld turne thar falouschip and complicis than beand absent til na
preiudice twiching quhatsumeuir clame or persute that thai had or mycht haf
agane the said skippar in tym cuming sen the persons fornemit did and referrit na
forthir in this matir bot alsfer as pertenis thaim self and thar gudis allanerly

the said day Alexander rede David simson alexander howison thom of marr' androw murra eldar
thomas prat Robert prat Johne simson Duncan smyth gilbert leche Wilyam futhes
William necolson' Wat piot androw rettre and David prat chosin and sworn in ane assise
apon the debate betuix the merchandis and skippar aboue nemmyt Riply avisit and
witnez tharupon sworn' and producit fand and deliuerit that the merchandis of the quhilkis
the names ar before writin sal answer' the said henric smyth mastir of the schip
toresaue thare gudis here within the port and havyn' of this burgh and topay him thar
fraght et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xvij die
mensis nouembris anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo

The quhilk dai it wes decretit and deliuerit be ane sworn' assise and pronuncit
be Dauid menyes yungar taillisman of the assise / that of alsmony lastis that
wes in the schip of helingstan' that com oute of Danskyn' of quartar and half quartar
Johne stevynson' sal pay a peny of euery barel til Dauid mathoson' / and
for the wrangwis' withhalding tharof the said Johne wes adiugit in amerciament of
this courte / and til content the said Dauid within terme of law.

The sammyn dai the Aldirman and consale of this burgh has decretit and ordanit that
William moore sal content and pay til Androw branch xxix s' g' for a barel of
salmond that the said Wilyam tuke in flandris of the said androis and for the fracht
custum and vncostis of vthir thre barellis of salmond / and gif it likis nocht til the
said Androw branche til tak the saidis xxix s' g' thai haf ordanit that Wilyam
more sal pay thre pundis scottis for the pund g' and the remanand as it cum
is tharto / and tobe pait within / xv dais / the saidis parties beand oblist til vndirly
and abide at the determinacion of the aldirman and consale forsaid before the pronuncia
cion of this deliuerence before expremyt

Item the said day Androw branche producit be Johne the Waus yungar' tobere
leil witnessing anent j barrel of salmond debatabil betuix him and androw goldsmyth the
quhilk barrel of salmond the said androw optenit apon' James of Douglas / the gret
aith sworn he has declarit that the said barrel of salmond that wes optenit
apon James of Douglas com to grimbisby / and the said James wes nocht in that
schip in that viage

William of cadiou second witnes deponis be his aith that the barrel of salmond
that wes optenit apon James / of Douglas com to lundon' and alsfer as he knaw
is it pertenit to my lord of abirdene and his factouris

James of Douglas the thrid witnes sworn' declaris that the barrel of salmond
optenit apon him be androw goldsmyth pertenit to my lord of abirdene and his fac
touris and til nane vthiris / And thir deposcionis war takin before thomas fife the balye et cetera

Item the sammyn' dai the Aldirman and consale fand and deliuerit that Dauid mathoson' aw tocontent
and pay til Johne stevynson' four' mettis of salt eftir the tenour of ane act made of be
fore and producit be the said Johne tharupon'

Curia tenta per ballivos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xx die no
uembris anno Dominj supradicto

The quhilk dai It wes determynit and deliuerit be ane sworn assise and pronuncit
be Dauid menyes eldar taillisman of the assise / that Thomas of mar aw til
deliuer to William of tulidef al his gudis / and the said Wilyam topay til him
his hail fraught

Curia tenta per balliuos burgi de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die mensis
Nouembris Anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo

Quo die Alexander rede gilbertus Waus et Thomas de marr' arbitri alias
electi inter Willelmum moyses et Johannem stevynson' fatebantur se decretum de
disse quod dictus Johannes stevynson' tenetur eidem Willelmo moyses in xxxv s'
vsualis monete / pro omnibus clameis et debatis auditis per Alexandrum rede vnum
arbitrorum predictorum inter dictas partes aliquibus temporibus retroactis

The assise decretis and ordanis that a seriand sal pas with Androw ancroft til the wif
of Alexander rede / and see quhat scho grantis hir tobe pait of a hous' mail be John'
symson in the quhilk he duelt / and alsfer as scho has gottin tobe allowit to
the said Johne And of the remanand of the mail vnpait / the said Johne is fundin
dettour topay the said androw within lauchful tyme

Item the said dai Johne cutlar' was convict for the wrangwis' strublans of Cristy
prat and of his brothir alexander prat / and adiugit tharfor in amerciament and til amende
as law wil / And the assise be the quhilk he wes conuict fand and deliuerit that
the said John' is a nychtwalkar' / quharfor thai haue ordanit / that quhat tyme
he beis fundin vp fra ix houris of the nycht / tobe bannyst fra this toun'

The sammyn dai Comperit before the Aldirman and ballies sittand in Jugement
and diuers' of the consale of this burgh Wilyam blindsel eldar as procuratour and
curat til Alexander voket brothir and apperand ayr' til henry voket / sayand
that thar wes certane statis and possessions gevin til Robert of culan burges
of the said burgh apon' the alienacionis made be the said henry voket of a
mark of annuel of a land liand in the castel gate / and of a bern with the tail
liand on the west syde of the gallou gate hede in gret scath and hendering
of his sistir barnys and Wil vokatis / quharfor the said Wilyam blindsel
protestit that the saidis alienacionis statis and possessionis made and gevin / nor quhat
sumeuir vthir alienacion or possessione tobe made or gefin in tym cuming
of ony land or annuale pertening to the said henry voket and his brethir
suld be na preiudice til the said alexander voket and his brethir forsaidis
Alsua the said Wilyeam protestit / that the donacion that the aldirman and
consale gaf / of a half net of the pot wattir / and of ane vthir half
net of the watir of the furdis / that the said quhilum William voket
had in assedacion of this toune / suld be na preiudice to the said
Wilyam voketis barnys vthirwais than law wil.

The sammyn' dai Dauid Duncan seriand present before the ballies in the court a goldin
ryng lade in wed be Wilyeam moyses to Mawnis Wormot / and gevin til him
toger pryse / the quhilk sergeand declarit / that he gerd price the said ryng
iiij merket dais / and that it wes prisyt the ferd day for xij s' be James
Kemp and gilbert riburne sworn' to the apprising of the sammyn'

Item the said dai Alexander trail the quhilk tuke topreve him dischargit of
ane obligacion quhar' he wes bundin til alexander bron' that clamyt him of
a certan rest of the said obligacion / producit and schew in Jugement to the bal
yeis that sammyn' obligacione for his discharge / witnes the court

the sammyn dai before Thomas fife and Androw branch twa of the ballies
of this burgh In the tolbuthe Wilyeam blindsel eldar has constitute and orda
nit his emme Wilyeam blindsel yongar and ser Edward robertson' chaplan
coniunctlie and seueraly his verra lachful and vndoutit procuratouris actouris
factouris and speciale deputis / anent the assedacion made til William rettre
of the haly lande and to thom malisson' of the lang Riggis and the angel
wel / toask thar' assedacion tobe sene / the malis and dewities tharof til
ask and ressaue / and to set thaim gif nede be / And in that matir and al vthiris
concerning him to folou do and defend in his name and for him as law wil
and as he mycht so in propir person / promittand tohald ferm' and stabil be the
faith of his body quhatsumeuir thing his saidis procuratouris or ony of
thaim in his name laufully sal do / witnes heirof William futhes John'
of Kintor brothir til maistir thomas Kintor Robert harrowar seruitour til androw branch
philp of Dunbrek seriand and vthiris sindry

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxvijmo
die mensis Nouembris anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

The sammyn dai It wes decretit and ordanit be the ballies and the court / that
quhat gudis Alexander howison may mak gude ar cumin hame til him fra
Robert senyour his merchand / that William of tulidef intromettour with the saidis gudis
on the behalf / of the said Robert / sal answer' til the said alexander of the sammyn
gudis but ony dilatouris of law And tomak that gude as said is / the
balyeis has assignit til the said Alexander friday next tocum

Eodem die Willelmus de tulidef prosecutus per plegium extensum per thomam de marr'
pro iniusta detencione duarum barellarum bituminis ab eodem thoma / adiudicatus fuit in
amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione earundem prout deliberatus fuit per assisam et ad satis
faciendum eidem thome infra terminum Juris

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem primo die mensis Decembris
Anno Domini et cetera lxxxmo

The quhilk day before the aldirman and ballies sittand in Jugement Williame
moore has fundin Alexander rede souertie for him be the faith of his body
til content and pay til Androw branch four' pundis sevyn' schillingis of scottis monee
for xxix s' g' / betuix this and the feist of paisch nixt tocum in the said burgh
withoute ony langar' dilay / the quhilk some' androw branch optenit apon' the said
Wilyeam before the aldirman and consale of before like as is contenit at mare linthe
in the act made tharupon / And Wilyeam more is oblist be his land and gudis to
free and tokepe scaithles alexander rede of the said souerty

Eodem die in presencia prepositi et ballivorum protribunali sedencium Johannes fichet inuenit gilbertum
Waus plegium legalem quod / Ricardus litstar erit indempnis de ipso Johanne aliter
quam per viam Juris Et eodemmodo Johannes litstar deuenit plegius legalis pro dicto Ricardo
genero suo die indempnitate Johannis fichet aliter quam Jura volunt Quodque comparebunt
dicte parte hodie ad quindenam coram preposito et ballivis responsurus et Juri periturus pro pertur
bio inter se facto et cetera

Johannes Kelach conuictus fuit per assisam de forisstallacione mutonum transportando eos
extra libertatem burgi et pro forisstallacione lane

Thomas barry conuictus per assisam adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione et
wlneracione Johannis stomok et tenetur emendare ei ad visum proborum virorum
Et dictus Johannes accusatus / quitus fuit per assisam de perturbio prefati thome barry

Item quidam Willelmus et philippus rure manens ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbio adinuicem
prout compertum fuit per assisam

The samyn dai Alexander howison' Dauid gethan' alexander rolland and thar' complicis
producit thir personis vndirwritin tobere witnessing in the action eftir folowand

Thomas of marr' and thomas scrogis the gret aith sworn' deponis and declaris for
the first and second witnez / that al the gudis that thai wyst Robert senyour had
of the merchandis of Abirdene war cumin hame in thare schip and in the fyrth
except / a pak of lynt and a styk of wax that lay in Danskyn owyr yer'

Androw rettre John' ferssane thome thomson' and James andirson' the thrid
iiij v. and last witnez sworn' and examinyt deponit in like wise as the
twa first witnez
And thir' deposicionis war ressauit in presence of thomas fife and androw branch ballies
